website_summaries.verdict: Don't expect Piper's slight build to mean that it's short on performance. This $239 all-in-one security system offers a great value for smaller homes and budding DIYers.
pros: There are a ton of useful home security and home automation features squeezed into Piper's compact frame
It looks great, too, which doesn't hurt
cons: The app design is a little busy, and I wish it had night vision
If you don't like Z-Wave, you're kind of out of luck in the accessories department

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.  Try another brand.
customer_reviews.text: When it stays connected to the network, it's great. But it repeatedly disconnects from the wifi network and you can't try reconnecting it until you're back in the house. Because we are using it in a weekend house, it defeats the security purpose. Very disappointed. ps. Customer service confirmed the problem is not with our wifi network.
customer_reviews.author: Dickie Sampsoun

customer_reviews.title: app is unstable. Stay away from this useless product
customer_reviews.text: love it when the app works. App disconnects too much and support is of no help. Don't bother with this until PIPER designs an app that work . Wish i could return it and get the Samsung SmartCam HD Plus 1080p Wi-Fi IP Monitoring Camera. Update. Still having trouble with app losing connection. I have emailed piper various times. They blame everything from my iPhone to my router. Don't buy this piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: Live video feed to my cell phone, easy to set up, records and saves videos without needing some pricey subscription; basically everything I wanted. Love the two way audio, had some good laughs watching the dog at home alone. I did feel bad seeing his confusion when the little white box yelled at him for putting his feet on the coffee table... I think the best thing about this product is that you can tell that Piper has a good tech team that really cares about keeping the software up to date, adding new features and listening to the needs of their customers. This was the perfect choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Stillman

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended until  software issues corrected.
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Pipers for 2 years. Initially, they worked great and I really liked them. Unfortunately, Piper revised the original app software and, since that time, I have had ongoing connectivity issues. I have contacted the support team and, after an hour, we are able to get the cameras working but they usually fail to make a connection again within 24-48 hours. Piper should really consider either fixing the existing software or rolling back to the last version (when they had "Vacation" mode). That software was much more reliable. I do NOT recommend purchasing this product until Piper corrects the current siftware deficiencies.
customer_reviews.author: J Fox

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: It drops the wifi network frequently. Power outages stop it dead in its tracks. I recently changed internet providers and spent about 45 minutes last night reconnecting to the new network. The interface is not user-friendly and it was difficult to learn how to reconnect. A separate log-in with separate password is necessary to access the help knowledge base. It was connected as of last night. Today I logged in and it is offline again. I'm going to investigate other options. Nest or Arlo, most likely.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Smithee

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend the Piper security camera. I own 2 of these, and while the features are great, the execution leaves a lot of room for improvement. We have a vacation home which is 1300 miles away from our full time residence. The Piper had repeatedly gone offline. The only recommendation from the help desk (which is definitely located in a country where English is not the primary language) for correcting this is a hard reset, which requires someone to be there. Not much value when you don’t live there. If the software and support was more robust, this could be a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: dickepa

customer_reviews.title: All renters need a Piper!
customer_reviews.text: Overall satisfied with Piper, set up took a lot longer and was difficult in my opinion. Compared to other items using Wi-Fi only, this Piper took forever to connect and constantly dropped or couldn't find network even with a strong signal. Updates and firmware took a long time to update. Once set up it worked perfectly! Knowing that place is secure is a great comfort. Renters all need this! No more wondering if maintenance or landlords have entered when expected or when your not present. 2 way talk and the sensors, like temperature and humidity, make this stand out from competitors. App and interface could use an update.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Great unless you want to leave the house
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and features and quality of product. Unfortunately my unit needed to be reset constantly in person. Kind of defeats the purpose of leaving the house if you need to be there in person to reset unit. Three stars because it took a few minutes to set up, love the interface and ease of use, two way audio was decent. Did not like the voice telling my pet sitter Piper was armed and disarmed - should be able to disable that. If they fix the reset problem I will buy another. But judging from online comments that's not happening anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so I'm glad I waited a while to post my review on ...
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't gliched at all. It did take a while to set up (which did get frustrating), so I'm glad I waited a hole to post my review on it. No false alarms. Knowing what I know about alarm company response times (getting the activation, calling the homeowner, calling law enforcement, etc), I'd much rather have this little device. If someone breaks in, you get an immediate notification & video. I'll call the cops myself & give them real-time descriptions & updates. Love it so far !
customer_reviews.author: Allison P.

customer_reviews.title: Too unreliable
customer_reviews.text: App is too unreliable. When the app is working, Piper is great. But my Piper will randomly disconnect, and when it does, you have to reset the whole system. This is inconvenient if I am not physically near the Piper, and annoying when I have to go in where it is and set the alarm off until I can pull the battery. Definitely not recommended until app reliability is better, and judging from the other reviews, this has been a problem for awhile. Listen to the collective voice saying: there's too many problems with this device for it to be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: DRB

customer_reviews.title: Ok hardware- terrible software
customer_reviews.text: When it works the piper is great- sends alerts to my phone with clips of the video. Unfortunately the app often fails to connect to the unit, and I will have to refresh it over and over until it connects. This can often take several minutes which means there is no way I would consider using the siren feature. Ok for what it is, but won't work as a bone fide security system until they figure out the software
customer_reviews.author: Dsparks

customer_reviews.title: Get Piper...No really, GET Piper Now!
customer_reviews.text: I now have 3 Pipers with several door sensors connected. Piper is everything and more as promised by the product website. Webcam, security system, two-way voice talk from your smartphone App. The ONLY thing is that the video is FAR from HD quality, no matter what they say. Resolution is not the best (whether streaming inside the home or away) but sufficient to see what's going on in your home. Best part is there is NO monthly fee.
customer_reviews.author: Bad in Bahston

customer_reviews.title: My videos using the Piper nv are great and don't have that choppy effect like the regular ...
customer_reviews.text: I think I got a bummer one because the videos were very choppy and you couldn't recognize faces. I notified the vendor and they gave me a site to check the speed on my wifi and also wanted me to send pictures of what I was seeing. I did this and was back in forth 3-4 times but they never got back with me. I returned this for the Piper nv which it's worth the extra money because the Piper nv is IR and will take pictures and video in a completely dark room. The regular Piper does not do that. My videos using the Piper nv are great and don't have that choppy effect like the regular Piper does.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Works fine if it can stay connected to internet. Which is iffy. The Piper I have will NOT stay connected and will not reconnect to wifi system. Other similar products (Nest thermostat) in same space and using same network stay connected and reconnect just fine. Tech support's response is to reboot the wifi router. But if you bought this to keep an eye on your home while not there, this advice is plain ridiculous and unhelpful. I gave up. Currently looking for product to take its place.
customer_reviews.author: Really

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. Easy setup. Works well so far. Use as supplement for my existing monitored alarm. Video is very wide angle (fisheye) and somewhat limited resolution. Still won't substitute for monitored alarm for homeowners insurance discount, as have to prove to insurance company ( with statement) that you are using a monitoring service. Motion sensor is a nice feature and will text you fairly quickly if motion is detected.
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Security with no monthly fee
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 Pipers which we bought when we were selling our legacy home and in the process of moving to a retirement home. One Piper was kept upstairs to monitor temperature and overall security as we were concerned about the pipes freezing while we were down south. After the sale in the spring we added a second Piper to monitor the basement SUMP pump. After the house was sold we now use the Pipers in our retirement home for standard motion detection security and since they trigger on sound we also monitor for phone calls when away. Despite several power Outages the Pipers never need attention like rebooting, they just keep working.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Briggs, WB2HDM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Home Security
customer_reviews.text: Connected all Aeon lab z-wave products to my setup. Everything is easy to "pair". It's nice to be able to control everything with the app and not paying any monthly fee for security. You can setup up to 4 contacts in your trusted circle. They can be notified via a call, text or email if you want. You can setup different rules on how you want to be notified if the alarm is tripped. I bought this earlier version that doesn't have night vision, but also bought z-wave controlled lights that switches on when the alarm is tripped.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: fine for 10 months, now starts to disconnect.
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for 10 months, but since last week, it has disconnected 4 times already. And you have to be at the cam and reset it. As a security cam, this is such a deal-breaker. And I have no issue with my wifi, it is exactly the same as in the past 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: Chuan Huang

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Every time I have a network problem, or a power problem these things forget who they are. I have to and I have to go through that whole set of procedure again. Absolute crap.
customer_reviews.author: Akien MacIain

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Little Spy!
customer_reviews.text: Piper is on the corner of my mantle in the living room and sees the 2 major entrances and most windows on the first floor. The 1st floor bedroom windows are small and high so I don't worry about them. My only regret is not getting the night vision model. If you leave a small light on, you will be able to see everything with Basic Piper although it will be shadowy.
customer_reviews.author: AbinoLynne

customer_reviews.title: The Piper security system was recommended to me by a insurance (medical) adjustor
customer_reviews.text: The Piper security system was recommended to me by a insurance (medical) adjustor. It arrived and works perfect. WE really like the fact that it can send us messages for the set alerts. We can talk back to our dogs who are inside while we are gone. It helps monitor our home temp. WE are looking forward to adding the add ons.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Piper security
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the piper security device at the recommendation of a guy I work with who has it in his home. I live in an apartment so I was looking for something that was simple, yet would provide the level of security of a security system. I am completely satisfied with the product and I also purchased the contacts for my two doors as well as two light controls. Set up was simple and quick. The control app is very versatile and offers many different options/rules that you can set up. I would recommend spending the extra money for the model with the night vision, because you cannot see anything at night if there are no lights on.
customer_reviews.author: Carl P. Lemarble

customer_reviews.title: For that price I had expected more
customer_reviews.text: Had the camera for a couple of days. Sometimes I cannot connect for reasons unknown to me, which is annoying. I am trying to monitor my cats and the night visibility is not there and even with moderate light the picture is flaky. Not sure what to expect because this my first camera of that type. If it continues to be accessible intermittently, I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Robti

customer_reviews.title: Does work
customer_reviews.text: Went to set it up and my Moto X first gen running 4.4.4 wouldnt connect to it. Uninstalling and reinstalling the app didnt work either. I finally got it to work by going to SETTINGS>APPS>PIPER then force stopping the app and then clearing the cache. Once all that was done it has worked fine. I live out in the country and use it as an alarm such that when I come home at night I'll know if there is an intruder AND I keep the siren off so an intruder wont know that I know they are there. That way I can surprise them with some love ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Don B.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it unless you have OCD & like to push buttons
customer_reviews.text: Nope! Don't do it. Picture quality is grainy. I mainly got it for the door opening and water sensor accessories. But trying to connect them is a complete nightmare. Plan to spend at least 30 minutes pressing a button only to get a timeout response. The real fun part is when it decides to die and you have to go through the whole process of setting up the accessories again. I've been trying to fix this thing for over 2 hours. I'm about to just drive over the damn thing with my car. Oh and when customer service asks for your number in case you get disconnected, we got disconnected. That was about 2 hours ago. Still waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Else Duff

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I received my first Piper unit very quickly, I set up the system, registered and had it delivering video in about 30 minutes. With this excellent experience I than purchased an additional base unit, numerous smart switches, a couple of door sensors, and a micro smart switch. All were initialized easily. So far the system has been great. I did have one problem (operator error) that the piper tech support helped me through immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mountian33

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable when on vacation
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Simple setup - Great features - Temperature, Humidity, activity trendlines are informative and useful - Camera and microphone work extremely well. - Notifications are very useful Cons: - There really aren't very many home automation products out yet. Hopefully this improves in the future. For example, garage door openers, electronic door locks, etc. would be great to see. - Sometimes my tiny dog triggers the activity monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Sirdigsbyceasar

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up and connect to my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up and connect to my iPhone. It notifies me when I have left my home and forgot to turn on. I can see what my dogs are doing at any time of the day. I plan to buy another one to put at the other end of my house.
customer_reviews.author: B. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for motion detection even in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: My little Piper has been great so far and the service provided is FAST and FREE. How can you beat that?? I don't care that it's automated. If I saw my phone ringing with Piper's name on the Caller ID I wouldn't bother answering it, I'd load the app and quickly look at the camera while dialing up for the police!
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely piece of garbage. Every time I left my apartment it's "Not ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely piece of garbage. Every time I left my apartment it's "Not Connected". Even times it alerted me of a loud sound and when I went to check the feed it wasn't connected, so it left me with complete anxiety at work wondering what was going on. Got home and smashed it. Probably the best use I got from it. You should get paid for even using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it, so we'll see how it goes. Was very easy to set up. It alarmed a lot on the "Load" noise level, so I turned that off. I am going to let it run for a few weeks and turn that back on. See if after it has some history if it works better. App works well so far and easy to log in.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Majors

customer_reviews.title: It kind of sucks.
customer_reviews.text: It's more of an expensive toy than anything. Like it's only good for a teenager or college bedroom. Very cumbersome to use and activate/deactivate. I would not recommend nor buy from this company again. After a few months of use, I am somewhat disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TheDude

customer_reviews.title: Smile!  You're On Piper Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent quality camera protection system. I set it up easily and it functioned perfectly. Picked up motion and sound easily. However, I did return it when I found out that the newest version called "NV" has Night Vision. I had trouble finding it anywhere except from the manufacturers' web site. They only ship from Canada but FedEx delivery was only three business days to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B.

customer_reviews.title: I am not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Software: The iOS app is buggy, a lot of time the live video feed has clipping sound and I'll have to restart the app for it to work normally. Hardware: Z-wave support is limited and buggy. I got an Ecolink Garage door tilt sensor and got false signals. I took out the battery from the sensor and 4 hours later Piper reported the garage door has been opened. WTF?
customer_reviews.author: Clare Huang

customer_reviews.title: Good home security  system , at a nice price !
customer_reviews.text: The piper does a lot , There are many options and settings. They just added night vision......but save your money the night vision is nothing to brag about. A little less fish eye would work better. And a little more sharpness would help. All and all its a great system , The only real negative thing is you can't transfer the video to anything !! I am sure the piper system will continue to make improvements.
customer_reviews.author: mister g

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but needs improvement. Its hard to connect to the server at times. Continuous recording capability needs to be added. The ability to view and control piper from your pc would be most helpful. I am considering returning this product and possibly get the one with night vision, but amazon does not sell it. Overall great concept, if the company makes some needed improvement soon this would be an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: EF

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: Some good things, some bad. The bad: Slow to load, no date range control on the stats, no web application - app only, few updates seems like a create it and forget it product. The good: Easy set up, battery backup, decent app.
customer_reviews.author: B. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with that part and the technical team could not ...
customer_reviews.text: Have a problem with the cameras going off line and then having to reset them a lot. Not happy with that part and the technical team could not answer why this is happening, except that my wifi may be weak in this area.... Otherwise started out great...
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Prenkert

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.  Connection to Z Wave Peripherals a Complete Failure
customer_reviews.text: Base unit works fine and is a terrific product. The Zwave smart switch pairing was a complete failure, however. The base unit would not pair with the switch in spite of repeated efforts. I requested advice from Piper customer service and that didn't help either. Recommend the product but do NOT recommend it to manage the peripherals that are advertised with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Reinheimer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my detached shop
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to add security to my wood working shop. My shop is detached from my home and I have tens of thousands of dollars worth of equipment. I was always worried someone might break in while I was away at work or out of town...with Piper, I no longer worry. Set up was RIDICULOUSLY easy...took 5 minutes. If you can plug in a lamp and down load an app on your smartphone, you can install Piper.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Myers

customer_reviews.title: Garbage piece of hardware
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish. Video quality is horrendously horrible- borders on uselss. Constantly disconnects from network. Now, it will not power on. It is a brick. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: UNC-Tarheels

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. User friendly mobile app. Options to add multiple z wave sensors to easily expand system as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Piper good cost effective  home security.
customer_reviews.text: Decent home security product for a good price. The Piper camera lets you monitor a large area with motion detection, sound, and temperature updates. I added a z-wave light switch for added security. The major weakness in the Piper product is the limited amount of certified smart home products, and the lack of IFTTT software intergration.
customer_reviews.author: BarryP

customer_reviews.title: Great little self-monitoring security system
customer_reviews.text: I now love our new Piper! Had a little difficulty at first getting to pair with WiFi, but after reading the instructions VERY carefully, am now a very satisfied customer. Only gave a four star because it did not have some of the other extras that other single package security systems have, but had more overall. But now they have the night vision camera as well as better resolution!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Good system, the only problem is that in their ...
customer_reviews.text: Good system, the only problem is that in their ads they show pictures that are not distorted, BUT because of their "Fisheye" lens it does distort the pictures on the right and left. Well made, well designed and functions well, overall a VERY GOOD product.
customer_reviews.author: Walter J Tofel

customer_reviews.title: Started out okay, then downhill from there....
customer_reviews.text: Everything started out great; this item did what I needed it to do. The picture quality is garbage as is the sound, but I just needed to know when my apartment was entered and the text alerts were great. However, after about four months of use, I came home to the Piper not responding to the app. I reset it and my router, despite other things connected to my router working just fine. Upon plugging the Piper back up, a faint blue light appears then it disappears. The thing won't even power on anymore. Very disappointed that I paid $200 for this.
customer_reviews.author: T.H.

customer_reviews.title: OK security system but better options should be explored
customer_reviews.text: I continue to use my Piper classic all-in-one security system but believe better options are available in a similar price range. The video quality is low resolution and the recorded video clips are just that: clips. It's more of an observation than security system IMHO
customer_reviews.author: William J. Wertz

customer_reviews.title: The Best Security System Ever
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing in fact I bought another one from u and it was gently used but like new!! The video is so so cool and the fact u can speak to someone from the app remotely is ultra cool!! The staff is fabulous to help with set or any issues! Love it no complaints will never use another system And it's free what's not to love!!
customer_reviews.author: kandy

customer_reviews.title: Back for second Piper
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit we have purchased, one for each house. We were so impressed with one for our vacation home we bought one for our home. So far (6 months) we are very pleased with real time monitoring, the local weather alerts and the graphic read outs provided.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie’s two cents

customer_reviews.title: Security without expense
customer_reviews.text: Piper is easy to set up and you determine what conditions to apply for siren, calls and text notifications. Plus being able to observe through the Puper camera you can determine your level of response. Just what I was looking for in a security system.
customer_reviews.author: R. V. Lund

customer_reviews.title: Probably better at 130-140 degrees
customer_reviews.text: Far too many disconnects to be effective. The fish eye image covers 180 degrees, which distorts the image. Probably better at 130-140 degrees. Returning the product after one day.
customer_reviews.author: JMCalifornia

customer_reviews.title: Piper Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of Piper camras. One is nv .does a good job .just don't put it close to a window to see through .dosnt work good there but other that that they are great. Technical support is TOP NOTCH .THEY KNOW THEIR BUSINESS. .One draw back is when you loose power and your not home you have to reset them or at least I did .even whith the battery back up . They are worth the money . I like the fact there's no montring fee.if the motion is set too , high you get false alerts.the alarm siren is hi pitch will get attention.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Lipford

customer_reviews.title: Works great but I wish the development team would add more ...
customer_reviews.text: I use 1 Piper in the main room of my apartment along with z-wave sensors on the doors and windows. Works great but I wish the development team would add more features. Even disregarding the low cost and no monthly fee, Piper still blows professional security systems out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: It will be amazing when we get a dog and can watch him ...
customer_reviews.text: We keep our Piper in our living room to watch the door. It will be amazing when we get a dog and can watch him on the camera. Great price for all the features you get without having to pay a monthly service fee. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Stone

customer_reviews.title: Love this but wished I got the NV.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE Love LOVe this!! I love it so much my family bought one for my elderly grandfather...so we can keep and eye on him. I also plan and buying on more for my home. I suggest getting the Night vision one.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Piper Classic - Stylish and Solid; But Just a Few Suggestions
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and solid however the setup process was a little convoluted at first as Piper couldn't connect to my WiFi. After setup and a firmware download it has been working fine. I would like to see a "timed modes" to schedule away, traveling, etc. and online web management aside from just the phone/tablet app. Also more automation for advanced workflow functionality. Other than that it seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mada2885

customer_reviews.title: When it did work it was great. Sad that they don't make things to last
customer_reviews.text: After a year and a couple months of use, the camera stopped working. When it did work it was great. Sad that they don't make things to last.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: PIPER
customer_reviews.text: INSIDE CAMERA DOES IT'S JOB, I AM VERY PLEASED WITH IT'S CAPABILITIES
customer_reviews.author: M.E.. Glass

customer_reviews.author: Lisa N.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Looks greats. Easy to set up. Great as an alarm system. But video quality SUCKS! Plus it only records for 35 seconds and you can not download the footage to your computer. I only can watch it on your phone and sometimes I have a hard time logging into the app.
customer_reviews.author: Presise

customer_reviews.title: This noodle is limp.
customer_reviews.text: If you lose connection you cannot remote start it. You must physically push the reset button. Not helpful if you are away. I regret buying 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: limp noodles

customer_reviews.title: Functions as advertised with ample light
customer_reviews.text: Functions as advertised with ample light. Definitely hard to see images in low light situations.
customer_reviews.author: zzggyy

customer_reviews.title: Amazon customer service was fantastic, I wish everyone would take lessons from them
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feelings... the first unit failed to work, spent 6 hours trying. Called Piper customer service and nothing. Sent several emails and nothing. I finally called Amazon customer service and was told they would send out a replacement overnight, they did, and it is working as advertised. Amazon customer service was fantastic, I wish everyone would take lessons from them. Made my purchase enjoyable. Thank you Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: The greatest thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it can track temperature and humidity. If I go out of town and my heat goes out or my house floods, I'll know. So many more options than other cameras. Had it about 3-4 months and never had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: E. McMahan

customer_reviews.title: The best Item I've purchased for my home yet!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say other than I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS ITEM!!! I love then fact that its an all in one device that helps me manage the diagnostics and security of my home, giving me the comfort and security of having visibility I need when I'm not home.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Security System

product_meta.title: Piper classic All-in-One Security System with Video Monitoring Camera, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackPiper is the first all-in-one home security and home automation device. It combines an HD camera, panoramic video, Z-Wave home automation, two-way audio and environmental sensors into a single, elegant product that you interact with on your Android/iOS device.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Piper is the first all-in-one home security and home automation device. It combines an HD camera, panoramic video, Z-Wave home automation and environmental sensors into a single, elegant product that you interact with on your Android/iOS device. Piper transcends traditional security with no monthly contracts or fees, and there is no installation required; it is ready out of the box. One of Piper's main features includes fully customizable security through its wide-angle camera that lets you watch over what matters most. Set up rules for what Piper does when you're at home, away or on vacation -- "If motion is detected while I'm on vacation, sound the siren, record a video, and send me a text message."-- and know immediately what's going on. Piper also features alerts so you can get notified when things happen at home with a phone call, text message, or email and watch a video of what got Piper's attention. Within the camera view, watch live video and talk directly to occupants in the room. Piper is ideal for communicating with kids after school, pets while at work, house sitters while away and for checking in on elderly parents or grandparents. Lastly, Piper features smart hardware and comes equipped with a motion detector, microphone, piercing siren, and battery backup for constant protection. Its built-in Z-Wave controller enables you to control, automate and schedule lights and small appliances, so your home can manage itself. Z-Wave accessories are required in order to enable Z-Wave functionality.
feature_bullets: WIFI SECURITY SYSTEM: Built-in 105 dB siren, motion, sound, and other environmental sensors that protect your home or office at all times.

HD SECURITY CAMERA: Watch live or recorded video in HD with a 180-degree field of view camera on your smartphone or tablet. You can even pan, tilt and zoom to explore your entire room and interact with your family or pets via two-way audio.
HOME AUTOMATION: Automate, schedule and remotely control lights and appliances directly from the Piper app with Z-Wave accessories such as plug-in modules, dimmers, and door/window sensors.
RECEIVE REAL-TIME ALERTS: Piper will notify you when events are detected through any combination of push messages, texts, emails, and phone calls.
NO MONTHLY FEES: There are no contracts or service fees. Store up to 100 videos with Piper's free cloud storage. Please refer the User Manual before use.
